message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. I believe it's a great value for you considering its potential. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position. While I appreciate your offer, I need to stay closer to $1 million to make this deal work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000 for your product. This is the highest amount I am comfortable with paying.
